name: Process Start From Suspicious Folder
description: Detects process start from rare or uncommon folders like temporary folder or folders that usually don't contain executable files
query: (process.executable:(/.*\\[Dd][Ee][Ss][Kk][Tt][Oo][Pp]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\\.*/ OR /.*\\[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp][Oo][Rr][Aa][Rr][Yy]\ [Ii][Nn][Tt][Ee][Rr][Nn][Ee][Tt].*/) AND (NOT ((process.parent.executable:(/[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Cc][Ll][Ee][Aa][Nn][Mm][Gg][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\ \([Xx]86\)\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\ [Vv][Ii][Ss][Uu][Aa][Ll]\ [Ss][Tt][Uu][Dd][Ii][Oo]\\[Ii][Nn][Ss][Tt][Aa][Ll][Ll][Ee][Rr]\\[Rr][Ee][Ss][Oo][Uu][Rr][Cc][Ee][Ss]\\[Aa][Pp][Pp]\\[Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ii][Cc][Ee][Hh][Uu][Bb]\\[Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ii][Cc][Ee][Ss]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\.[Vv][Ii][Ss][Uu][Aa][Ll][Ss][Tt][Uu][Dd][Ii][Oo]\.[Ss][Ee][Tt][Uu][Pp]\.[Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ii][Cc][Ee]\\[Bb][Aa][Cc][Kk][Gg][Rr][Oo][Uu][Nn][Dd][Dd][Oo][Ww][Nn][Ll][Oo][Aa][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]32\\[Dd][Xx][Gg][Ii][Aa][Dd][Aa][Pp][Tt][Ee][Rr][Cc][Aa][Cc][Hh][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR process.parent.executable:/[Cc]\:\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\ \([Xx]86\)\\[Nn][Vv][Ii][Dd][Ii][Aa]\ [Cc][Oo][Rr][Pp][Oo][Rr][Aa][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\.*/) OR (process.executable:/.*[Ss][Ee][Tt][Uu][Pp]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR (process.executable:/[Cc]\:\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\ \([Xx]86\)\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\\.*/ AND process.executable:/.*\.[Tt][Mm][Pp]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt][Ee][Dd][Gg][Ee][Uu][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/))))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:(*\\Desktop\\* OR *\\Temp\\* OR *\\Temporary\ Internet*) AND (NOT ((process.parent.executable:(C\:\\Windows\\System32\\cleanmgr.exe OR C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\Microsoft\ Visual\ Studio\\Installer\\resources\\app\\ServiceHub\\Services\\Microsoft.VisualStudio.Setup.Service\\BackgroundDownload.exe OR C\:\\Windows\\System32\\dxgiadaptercache.exe) OR process.parent.executable:C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\NVIDIA\ Corporation\\*) OR (process.executable:*setup.exe) OR (process.executable:C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\Microsoft\\Temp\\* AND process.executable:*.tmp\\MicrosoftEdgeUpdate.exe))))`
